titleStmt.title: DHSI 2023 Text Encoding Fundamentals - Personography Template

body.div:
Welcome to the Homeric Hymn to Hermes! If you hover over the indicated spots, a map should show up if there is data available. Make sure to hover for more than a moment: the map can take a second to load.
Instructions:
I would encourage you to use Google Chrome, as that is how I tested the software.

linkGrp.desc: Now it switches to Apollo, how to mark transitions????
